name: Audi A6
description: The price of Audi A6, a 5 seater Sedan, ranges from Rs. 64.07  - 70.41 Lakh. It is available in 3 variants, with an engine of 1984 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. A6 has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 6 airbags. Audi A6 is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 14 kmpl for A6.

variants.variant_name: A6 Premium Plus 45 TFSI 1984 cc, Petrol, Automatic (DCT), 14 kmpl, 261 bhp
A6 Technology 45 TFSI W/O Matrix 1984 cc, Petrol, Automatic (DCT), 14 kmpl, 261 bhp
